'''Mrs. Burkart''' is the widow whom [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] cater for (but appears upset when Monica proffers her bill) in "[[The One With The Dirty Girl]]".  She was played by [[Gretchen Wyler]].
